synopsis.text: Haruka Nanase forms a swim club with his friends Makoto, Nagisa, and Rei during high school. Though initially reluctant, Haruka rediscovers his love for swimming through competing with them. Meanwhile, Haruka's childhood friend and rival Rin Matsuoka returns from abroad with Olympic ambitions. After some tense confrontations, Haruka and Rin rebuild their friendship through racing one another again. In their final high school year, Haruka, Makoto, Nagisa, and Rei aim to compete successfully as a team in upcoming tournaments before graduation. At the elite Samezuka Academy, Rin resolves to do the same. Haruka and Makoto feel uncertain about their futures beyond high school swimming, while Rin has already decided to pursue his Olympic dream. Nevertheless, with their friends' support, Haruka and Rin continue striving to become better swimmers as they near the next chapter of their lives.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
